text:
I suddenly was experiencing a 500 Server Error on certain pages, but could not find any more explanation in the log files. When increasing the log level from notice to info, I found the culprit of my problem:

[Tue Feb 28 19:33:46.831489 2017] [authnz_ldap:info] [pid 19237:tid 140392114218752] [client XXX.XXX.XXX.XXX:XXXXX] AH01695: auth_ldap authenticate: user foo authentication failed; URI /ganglia [LDAP: ldap_simple_bind() failed][Can't contact LDAP server]

I think this error should have a higher log level so that this is not hidden by default, probably at least warn.
creator: fhimpe@vub.ac.be
